channel.title: Anyone play any instruments in real life?
channel.description: I play guitar, bass and keyboard, though I play guitar more. I have an otamatone, but that’s a little hard to get use to. It’s been 1 more years since I’ve played keyboard. I use to play violin in middle school, but I sadly never continued playing it. I played drums for a good few months, but I stopped since the person that would let me use their drum set moved away. I think that’s pretty much all the instruments I’ve ever played.

item.title: Anyone play any instruments in real life?
item.dc:creator: Plhector
item.description:
I play guitar, bass and keyboard, though I play guitar more. I have an otamatone, but that’s a little hard to get use to. It’s been 1 more years since I’ve played keyboard.
I use to play violin in middle school, but I sadly never continued playing it. I played drums for a good few months, but I stopped since the person that would let me use their drum set moved away.
I think that’s pretty much all the instruments I’ve ever played.
